WorkItem.Description: A little bit more horizontal space between Minimize, Maximize/RestoreDown and Close buttons. We (developers) can easily click, but the regular users, is a little bit more difficult.

Comments.Message: This should probably be a separate issue, but it'd be nice if you could specify which buttons to show as well.  For example on one of the projects I'm working on, I want to remove maximize.
This is a test comment (i'm trying to prove that i'm receiving email notifications when i shouldn't)
